definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: break (Ar. fad.=a break, break asunder; Nab. [[פחץ]] break asunder; Syr. pa9 crush);—

definitions.title: Pō‘.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יְפׂחֵץ סָָלַע]] Je 23:29 a hammer which shatters rock.

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[וַיְפַחְפְּחֵנִי]] Job 16:12 he [God] dashed me in pieces (fig.).
